basic.description:
The methodology of literary analysis. Assignments may include textual analysis and dissertation.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (30L;6O;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Analyse textuelle et étude de la langue

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A grade of C in FREN110 or a grade of B- in [FREN100 or (FREN101 and FREN102) or FREN150].
Exclusion     No more than 1 course from FREN220; FREN221; FREN230.
